choices.C: The Interconnects page shows throughput contributed by individual sessions on the private interconnect.
choices.B: The Interconnects page shows the load contributed by database instances on the private interconnect and the public network.
choices.A: The Interconnects page shows the load contributed by database instances on the public network.
choices.D: The Cluster Cache Coherency page shows which block classes are subject to intense global cache activity.
choices.E: The Cluster Cache Coherency page shows which instances are responsible for intense global cache activity.

questions.question_text: Which two statements are true concerning Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control Cluster Database performance pages? (Choose two.)
Which three are benefits of using RAC databases with multiple instances? (Choose three.)

choices.E: automatic workload management for services on Oracle Net connections
choices.G: parallel execution across all instances supporting a singleton policy-management service
choices.D: automatic workload management for services on local connections
choices.F: parallel execution across all instances supporting a balanced policy-management service

questions.question_text: Which three statements are tuning recommendations for RAC database? (Choose three.)

choices.E: Set PARALLEL_DEGREE_POLICY=AUTO to enable automatic Parallel Statement Queueing.
choices.D: Use Locally Managed Tablespaces with autoallocate.
choices.C: Use Locally Managed Tablespaces with large uniform extent sizes.
choices.B: Use sequences with CACHE and ORDER, if possible.
choices.F: Use sequences with CACHE and NOORDER, if possible.
choices.A: Set PARALLEL_DEGREE_POLICY=AUTO to enable In Memory Parallel Query.

choices.D: PDB_3 must be open READ ONLY in all CDB1 instances.
choices.A: PDB_3 must be closed on all CDB1 instances.
choices.E: Manually created services for PDB_3 are removed automatically from the OCR when dropping PDB_3.
choices.B: Manually created services for PDB_3 are not removed automatically from the OCR when dropping PDB_3.
choices.C: CDB1 must be open in restricted mode on all cluster nodes.

questions.question_text:
You administer a three-instance, policy-managed, multitenant RAC database CDB1 with three PDBs: PDB_1, PDB_2, and PDB_3.
You want to drop PDB_3.
Which two statements are true? (Choose two.)

choices.C: setting the PARALLEL_SERVERS_TARGET value equal to that of PARALLEL_MAX_SERVERS
choices.E: creating a UNIFORM service for a policy-managed RAC database
choices.D: using a database service to limit the number of instances that participate in parallel execution

discussion.content: B, D - Parallel force local and by service

questions.question_text: Which two actions can restrict the number of instances used for parallel execution of a SQL statement? (Choose two.)
